title: Dazzling Diamond Kada with Emerald & Ruby Accents
features: Exquisite openwork filigree design centered around a striking diamond-encrusted square. Features a stylized peacock motif with a central Emerald and Ruby accents evoking traditional South Indian aesthetics. The bracelet showcases meticulous craftsmanship, reminiscent of Nakshi work. Hinged for ease of wear.
colors: creating a rich and auspicious color palette.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special events. A cherished heirloom for generations.
description: This diamond kadiyam blends traditional South Indian artistry with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and precious gemstones add a touch of timeless luxury. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring superior quality and durability. A symbol of prosperity and good fortune.
